data.name: Lost in Vivo - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the original soundtrack for "Lost in Vivo"

Contrary to Steam's "This content requires the base game to play" message, it doesn't not require the base game at all. This is just the music from the game.

This OST contains 60 original songs in .mp3 format that you can find located in your Steam/steamapps/common/Lost in Vivo/OST folder.

1. Jarren Crist - Lost In Vivo (Title Screen) 03:47
2. Jarren Crist - Approaching Storm 03:47
3. Akuma Kira - Soggy Doggy Tunnel 03:41
4. Akuma Kira - Name Entry 00:59
5. Akuma Kira - Distant Axe Man 03:37
6. Akuma Kira - Drowning Doggo 03:30
7. Akuma Kira - Forbidden Tuna 02:48
8. Nolan Reese - Broken 03:30
9. Jarren Crist - Tunnel Visions 02:59
10. Jarren Crist - Graceful Serenity (Save Room Theme) 02:34
11. Akuma Kira - It's Very Late 01:04
12. Akuma Kira - Rusty Pipes 00:48
13. Nolan Reese - Into The Mine 06:49
14. Jarren Crist - Celestial Drowsiness 06:16
15. Akuma Kira - Bag Of Static 01:41
16. Jarren Crist - A Place To Drown In 02:31
17. Akuma Kira - Clicky Gurgles 00:32
18. Akuma Kira - Dreaming 00:48
19. Jarren Crist - Inward Distortions 02:20
20. Jarren Crist - Little Boxes 04:01
21. Akuma Kira - Saccharine 04:07
22. Jarren Crist - Stretched Thin 02:22
23. Akuma Kira - Strange Wind 01:49
24. Akuma Kira - Brain Melt 03:24
25. Jarren Crist - Don't Trust The Static 02:14
26. Nolan Reese - Ghost on the Tracks 02:20
27. Akuma Kira - I'm Not Sick 03:25
28. Akuma Kira - Bulimic 02:20
29. Jarren Crist - Hugging The Walls 02:43
30. Akuma Kira - Crazy Ghost Theme 00:54
31. Akuma Kira - What Do You Offer 00:12
32. Jarren Crist - Lonely Ivory 01:55
33. Jarren Crist - Underneath Us All 02:31
34. Akuma Kira - Elevator Crash 02:43
35. Akuma Kira - Haunted Menu 01:36
36. Akuma Kira - Horton Hears A Ghost In The Horton Mine 01:25
37. Jarren Crist - Erosive Movements 04:26
38. Jarren Crist - Old & Grey 02:02
39. Akuma Kira - The Man Who Stole Several Leopards 04:00
40. Akuma Kira - Ritual House 03:18
41. Jarren Crist - Watching, Waiting, Debating 02:18
42. Akuma Kira - Screaming Worms 01:58
43. Jarren Crist - Sinister Intentions 02:07
44. Akuma Kira - Rat People 01:14
45. Akuma Kira - Nezumi Testing Labs 00:53
46. Akuma Kira - Le Inferno 03:08
47. Jarren Crist - Singing To Myself 03:34
48. Akuma Kira - Praise Be, Bayagototh 04:36
49. Jarren Crist - A Little Piece Of Heaven 03:02
50. Jarren Crist - Menu/Save Room (Piano Version) 02:43
51. Akuma Kira - Old Credits 01:46
52. Akuma Kira - Eye Twitch (Game Over) 01:46
53. Akuma Kira - Old Credits No One Heard 01:48
54. Akuma Kira - Pizza 00:05
55. Akuma Kira - Spooky Music Dude 01:16
56. Akuma Kira - Un-Used Ghost Theme 01:12
57. Jarren Crist - Prosthetic Devotions 02:30
58. Jarren Crist - The Faithful Few 02:50
59. Jarren Crist - Shoggoth's Requiem 03:24
60. Akuma Kira - Shoggoth Is Mad 01:12

credits

Compositions by: Akuma Kira, Jarren Crist, Nolan Reese. The Soundtrack Direction and Supervision was performed by Akuma Kira.

data.short_description: This is the original soundtrack for Lost in Vivo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 1.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Intregraded graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Audio
  • Additional Notes: It's just music, so headphones/speakers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB NVIDIA Geoforce
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
  • Additional Notes: It's just music, so headphones/speakers

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Lost in Vivo - Original Soundtrack
